nome: Kami nomi zo Shiru Sekai: Tenri-hen

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Kami nomi zo Shiru Sekai: Tenri-hen
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: The World God Only Knows: Tenri Arc
metadata_completo.sinopse:
It is summer break and Keima intends to spend all his time on video games. An old acquaintance, the timid girl Tenri, comes back into the neighborhoodâ€”and apparently has a lost soul inside her. It is up to Keima and Elysia to unravel the secrets of her heart.

(Source: ANN)
